title: Scalpel, 19th–20th century
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Pointed scalpel with small projection on one side, engraved decoration on front side and ending in a point which can be attached to a handle. Small indents on one side near the projection.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scalpel, 19th–20th century.
19th–20th century. wood, steel, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-282-i.
